entity.name: autocompleteMcalc
entity.query: select 'MC_'+s.name as id,s.title,'mcalc' as contentype,s.name as group_s, s.name as contentid, 1 as sequence from T_JP_MedicalCalculator s UNION select 'MC_eGFR_Estimated_2' as id,substring(title,1,charindex('(',s2.title)-1) as title,'mcalc' as contentype,'eGFR_Estimated' as group_s, 'eGFR_Estimated' as contentid, 100 as sequence from T_JP_MedicalCalculator s2 where s2.name = 'eGFR_Estimated'

entity.name: autocompleteDisease
entity.query: SELECT tjd.id,tjd.title,tjd.sequence*100 as sequence,N'disease' as contentype,cast(N'Dis' as nvarchar)+cast(tjd.id as nvarchar) as group_s,tjd.id as contentid FROM T_JP_Disease as tjd where tjd.defunct=0 and tjd.status='A'

entity.name: autocompleteDiseaseSynonym
entity.query: SELECT 'DISEASESYNM_'+right('000'+cast(tjd.id as nvarchar),4) as id,tjd.title,tjd.synonyms,tjd.sequence*0.000000001 as sequence,N'疾患' as contentype,cast(N'Dis' as nvarchar)+cast(id as nvarchar) as group_s,tjd.id as contentid FROM T_JP_Disease tjd where tjd.defunct=0 and tjd.status='A'

entity.name: autocompleteLab
entity.query: SELECT 'SRLID_'+lab.srl_id as srl_id,lab.name,cast(lab.rank as real)*10+1,N'lab' as contentype,'SRL'+lab.srl_id as group_s,lab.srl_id as contentid FROM T_JP_LabTestTable1 lab

entity.name: autocompleteDrugGeneral
entity.query:
select 'JPCGENERAL_'+dd.code as code,case when charindex('
',dd.collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(dd.collective_name,1,charindex('
',dd.collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',dd.collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(dd.collective_name,1,charindex('
',dd.collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',dd.collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(dd.collective_name,1,charindex('
',dd.collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',dd.collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(dd.collective_name,1,charindex('
',dd.collective_name)-1) else collective_name end as collective_name,dd.sequence as sequence,'drug' as contentype,cast('JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(dd.code as nvarchar) as group_s,cast(dd.code as int) as contentid FROM T_JP_DrugData dd where sequence > 0.00001 order by sequence desc

entity.name: autocompleteDrugGeneric
entity.query:
select 'JPCGENERIC_'+dd.code as code,replace(replace(replace(replace(dd.generic_name,'
',','),'
',','),'
',','),'
',',') as generic_name,replace(replace(replace(replace(dd.generic_name,'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶') as generic_name_multi,dd.sequence as sequence,'drug' as contentype,cast(N'JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(dd.code as nvarchar) as group_s,cast(dd.code as int) as contentid FROM T_JP_DrugData dd where sequence > 0.00001 order by sequence desc

entity.name: autocompleteDrugNameSynonym
entity.query:
SELECT 'JPCNAMESYNM_'+code as code,therapeutic_class,general_name,namesynonym as synonyms ,replace(replace(replace(replace(general_name,'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶') as general_name_multi ,case when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) else collective_name end as collective_name,sequence as sequence,'drugnamesynonym' as contentype ,cast('JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(code as nvarchar) as group_s,generic_name,cast(code as int) as contentid FROM T_JP_DrugData where namesynonym is not null and sequence > 0.00001 order by sequence desc

entity.name: autocompleteDrugSubcategory
entity.query: select 'JPCSUBCAT_'+min(dd.code) as code,dd.therapeutic_class,max(dd.sequence) as sequence,'drugsubctg' as contentype ,cast(N'JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(min(dd.code) as nvarchar) as group_s,cast(min(dd.code) as int) as contentid FROM T_JP_DrugData dd where sequence > 0.00001 group by dd.therapeutic_class order by sequence desc

entity.name: autocompleteDrugSugCtgSynonym
entity.query:
SELECT 'JPCSUBCATSYNM_'+code as code,therapeutic_class,general_name,categorysynonym as synonyms ,replace(replace(replace(replace(general_name,'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶') as general_name_multi ,case when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) else collective_name end as collective_name,sequence as sequence,'drugsubctgsynonym' as contentype ,cast('JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(code as nvarchar) as group_s,generic_name,cast(code as int) as contentid FROM T_JP_DrugData where categorysynonym is not null and sequence > 0.00001 order by sequence desc

entity.name: autocompleteHoken
entity.query: select s.dir_path+':'+s.file_name as id,s.title,'insurance' as contentype,'Hok'+s.dir_path+':'+s.file_name as group_s ,s.dir_path+'/'+s.file_name as contentid from T_JP_Shirobon s where lower(rtrim(ltrim(s.file_name))) not in('index.html')

entity.name: titlesearchDisease
entity.query: SELECT 'TS_'+right('000'+cast(tjd.id as nvarchar),4) as id,tjd.title,tjd.sequence*100 as sequence,N'disease' as contentype,cast(N'Dis' as nvarchar)+cast(tjd.id as nvarchar) as group_s,tjd.synonyms,N'' as treevalue FROM T_JP_Disease as tjd where tjd.defunct=0 and tjd.status='A'

entity.name: titlesearchDiseaseSynonym
entity.query: SELECT 'TS_DISEASESYNM_'+right('000'+cast(tjd.id as nvarchar),4) as id,tjd.title,tjd.synonyms,tjd.sequence*0.000000001 as sequence,N'疾患' as contentype,cast(N'Dis' as nvarchar)+cast(tjd.id as nvarchar) as group_s,N'' as treevalue FROM T_JP_Disease tjd where tjd.defunct=0 and tjd.status='A'

entity.name: titlesearchLab
entity.query: SELECT 'TS_SRLID_'+srl_id as srl_id,name,cast(rank as real)*10+1,N'lab' as contentype,cast(N'SRL' as nvarchar)+cast(srl_id as nvarchar) as group_s,N'' as treevalue FROM T_JP_LabTestTable1

entity.name: titlesearchDrugGeneral
entity.query:
select 'TS_JPCGENERAL_'+code as code,therapeutic_class,general_name,replace(replace(replace(replace(general_name,'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶') as general_name_multi ,case when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) else collective_name end as collective_name ,sequence as sequence,'drug' as contentype,cast('JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(code as nvarchar) as group_s,generic_name,treevalue as treevalue FROM T_JP_DrugData where sequence > 0.00001 order by sequence desc

entity.name: titlesearchDrugNameSynonym
entity.query:
SELECT 'TS_JPCNAMESYNM_'+code as code,therapeutic_class,general_name,namesynonym as synonyms,replace(replace(replace(replace(general_name,'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶') as general_name_multi,case when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) else collective_name end as collective_name,sequence as sequence,'drugnamesynonym' as contentype,cast('JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(code as nvarchar) as group_s,generic_name,treevalue as treevalue FROM T_JP_DrugData where namesynonym is not null and sequence > 0.00001 order by sequence desc

entity.name: titlesearchDrugSubCtgSynonym
entity.query:
SELECT 'TS_JPCSUBCTGSYNM_'+code as code,therapeutic_class,general_name,categorysynonym as synonyms,replace(replace(replace(replace(general_name,'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶'),'
','¶') as general_name_multi,case when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) when charindex('
',collective_name)>0 then SUBSTRING(collective_name,1,charindex('
',collective_name)-1) else collective_name end as collective_name,sequence as sequence,'drugsubctgsynonym' as contentype,cast('JPC' as nvarchar)+cast(code as nvarchar) as group_s,generic_name,treevalue as treevalue FROM T_JP_DrugData where categorysynonym is not null and sequence > 0.00001 order by sequence desc

entity.name: titlesearchHoken
entity.query: select 'TS_'+s.dir_path+':'+s.file_name as id,s.title,'insurance' as contentype,'Hok'+s.dir_path+':'+s.file_name as group_s,N'' as treevalue from T_JP_Shirobon s where lower(rtrim(ltrim(s.file_name))) not in('index.html')

entity.name: fulltextsearchDisease
entity.query: select 'DISEASE_'+cast(x.main_id as nvarchar(max))+'_'+x.cfid+'_'+cast(row_number() over(order by x.type,x.main_id,x.cfid) as nvarchar(max)) as pkid,x.type,'DIS_'+cast(x.main_id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,x.actiontype,x.cfid,x.title,x.subtitle,x.title as title_whtml,x.subtitle as subtitle_whtml,x.body,x.url,x.sequence as sequence,x.main_id+x.cfid as group_s,x.tb_image,x.image_url, x.ad_image, x.popup_type,x.synonyms as synonym1,N'' as synonym2,'' as category1,N'' as treevalue,cast(1 as bit) as search_flag, created_date, important, body as 'contents', REPLACE(x.title,N'・',N'') as 'plaintitle' from ( select 'disease_text' as type,cast(id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'_' as actiontype,'ID0801' as cfid,case when charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1) > 0 then substring(d.title,1,charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1)-1) else d.title end as title,N'概要・推奨' as subtitle,cast(information as nvarchar(max)) as body,'ContentPage.aspx?diseaseid='+cast(id as varchar) as url,sequence as sequence,'' as tb_image, '' as image_url, '' as ad_image, '' as popup_type,isnull(cast(d.synonyms as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CAST(0 as bit) as important from T_JP_Disease as d where d.status = 'A' UNION select 'disease_text' as type,cast(d.id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'_' as actiontype,isnull(soss.code,N'_') as cfid,case when charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1) > 0 then substring(d.title,1,charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1)-1) else d.title end as title,soss.title as subtitle,cast(soss.comments as nvarchar(max)) as body,'ContentPage.aspx?diseaseid='+cast(d.id as varchar)+'#'+cast(soss.code as varchar) as url,d.sequence as sequence,'' as tb_image, '' as image_url, '' as ad_image, '' as popup_type,isnull(cast(d.synonyms as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CAST(0 as bit) as important from T_JP_SituationOrderSetSample as soss inner join T_JP_Situation as s on soss.situation_id = s.id inner join T_JP_Disease as d on s.disease_id = d.id where s.defunct = 0 and d.status = 'A' and soss.defunct = 0 UNION select 'disease_text' as type,cast(dat.disease_id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id, isnull(dat.type,N'_') as actiontype,isnull(ai.code,N'_') as cfid,case when charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1) > 0 then substring(d.title,1,charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1)-1) else d.title end as title,ai.title as subtitle,cast(ai.body as nvarchar(max)) as body,'ContentPage.aspx?diseaseid='+cast(d.id as varchar)+'#'+ai.code as url,d.sequence as sequence,'' as tb_image, '' as image_url, '' as ad_image, '' as popup_type,isnull(cast(d.synonyms as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CAST(0 as bit) as important from T_JP_ActionItem as ai inner join T_JP_DiseaseActionType as dat on ai.disease_actiontype_id = dat.id inner join T_JP_Disease as d on dat.disease_id = d.id where d.status = 'A' UNION select 'disease_text' as type,cast(ed.disease_id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'_' as actiontype,isnull(e.code,N'_') as cfid,case when charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1) > 0 then substring(d.title,1,charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1)-1) else d.title end as title,cast(e.header_message as nvarchar(max)) as subtitle,cast(e.description as nvarchar(max)) as body,'ContentPage.aspx?diseaseid='+cast(d.id as varchar)+'#'+e.code as url,d.sequence as sequence,'' as tb_image, '' as image_url, '' as ad_image, '' as popup_type,isnull(cast(d.synonyms as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CAST(0 as bit) as important from T_JP_Evidence as e inner join T_JP_EvidenceDisease as ed on e.id = ed.evidence_id inner join T_JP_Disease as d on ed.disease_id = d.id where d.status = 'A' UNION select 'disease_image' as type,cast(d.id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'_' as actiontype,isnull(i.code,N'_') as cfid,case when charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1) > 0 then substring(d.title,1,charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1)-1) else d.title end as title,i.title as subtitle,cast(i.description as nvarchar(max)) as body,'imageDetails.aspx?DiseaseID='+cast(d.id as nvarchar(max))+'&imagecode='+isnull(i.code,N'_') as url,d.sequence as sequence,I.tb_image as tb_image, 'imageDetails.aspx?DiseaseID='+cast(d.id as nvarchar(max))+'&imagecode='+isnull(i.code,N'_') as image_url, I.ad_image as ad_image,isnull(i.popup_type,'') as popup_type,isnull(cast(REPLACE(imp.searchkeyword,' ','') as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CASE WHEN imp.important IS NOT NULL THEN imp.important ELSE CAST(0 as bit) end as important from T_JP_Image as I inner join T_JP_ImgMapping as im on im.image_id = i.id inner join T_JP_Disease as d on im.disease_id = d.id LEFT OUTER JOIN T_JP_Image_Important as imp on im.disease_id = imp.disease_id AND I.code = imp.code where d.status = 'A' and i.status = 'A' and i.defunct = 0 and (imp.NonPublish IS NULL OR imp.NonPublish = 0) UNION select 'disease_text' as type,cast(d.id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'_' as actiontype,isnull(dd.code,N'_') as cfid,case when charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1) > 0 then substring(d.title,1,charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1)-1) else d.title end as title,N'鑑別疾患' as subtitle,cast(dd.differential_diagnosis as nvarchar(max)) as body,'ContentPage.aspx?diseaseid='+cast(d.id as varchar)+'#'+dd.code as url,d.sequence as sequence,'' as tb_image, '' as image_url, '' as ad_image, '' as popup_type,isnull(cast(d.synonyms as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CAST(0 as bit) as important from T_JP_DifferentialDiagnosis as dd inner join T_JP_Disease as d on dd.disease_id = d.id where d.status = 'A' UNION select 'disease_dd' as type,cast(d.id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'_' as actiontype,isnull(dd.code,N'_') as cfid,case when charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1) > 0 then substring(d.title,1,charindex(N'(治療',d.title,1)-1) else d.title end as title,dd.title as subtitle,cast(dd.content as nvarchar(max)) as body,'ContentPage.aspx?diseaseid='+cast(d.id as varchar)+'#'+dd.code as url,dd.sequence as sequence,'' as tb_image, '' as image_url, '' as ad_image, cast(dd.priority as nvarchar(max)) as popup_type,isnull(cast(d.synonyms as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CAST(0 as bit) as important from T_JP_DifferentialDiagnosis_AnswerBox as dd inner join T_JP_Disease as d on dd.disease_id = d.id where d.status = 'A' UNION select 'disease_prescription' as type,cast(d.id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'_' as actiontype, p.code as cfid,d.title as title,p.title as subtitle,cast(p.body as nvarchar(max)) as body, 'contentpage.aspx?diseaseid='+cast(d.id as varchar)+'#prescription_anchor_'+cast((p.prescription_sequential_id -1) as varchar) as url,prescription_sequential_id as sequence, '' as tb_image, '' as image_url, '' as ad_image, '' as popup_type,isnull(cast(d.synonyms as nvarchar(max)),N'') as synonyms, CONVERT(varchar, d.created_date, 20) as created_date, CAST(0 as bit) as important from T_JP_Prescription p INNER JOIN T_JP_Disease as d on p.disease_id = d.id where d.status = 'A' ) x

entity.name: fulltextsearchDrug
entity.query: select 'DRUG_'+cast(x.main_id as varchar(max))+'_'+x.cfid+'_'+cast(row_number() over(order by x.type,x.main_id,x.cfid) as nvarchar(max)) as pkid,x.type,'DRG_'+cast(x.main_id as varchar(max)) as main_id,x.cfid,x.title,x.subtitle,x.body,x.url,case when isnull(x.sequence,0)<1 then isnull(x.sequence,0)*0.1 else isnull(x.sequence,0)*50 end as sequence,x.main_id+x.cfid as group_s,N'' as tb_image,N'' as image_url,N'' as popup_type,x.namesynonym as synonym1,x.categorysynonym as synonym2,x.therapeutic_class as category1,x.treevalue as treevalue,isnull(search_flag,1) as search_flag, created_date, generic_name as 'generic_name', title as 'general_name', CASE WHEN is_generic IS NOT NULL THEN is_generic ELSE CAST(isnull(is_generic,0) as bit) end as is_generic, body as 'contents', collective_name from ( select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'適応' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【適応】' as subtitle,cast(dd.effect_usage as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag as search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.effect_usage as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' UNION select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'禁忌' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【禁忌】' as subtitle,cast(dd.contraindicate as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.contraindicate as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' UNION select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'注意' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【注意】' as subtitle,cast(dd.caution as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.caution as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' UNION select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'併用禁止' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【併用禁止】' as subtitle,cast(dd.not_combined_use as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.not_combined_use as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' UNION select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'併用注意' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【併用注意】' as subtitle,cast(dd.caution_combined_use as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.caution_combined_use as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' UNION select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'重大な副作用' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【重大な副作用】' as subtitle,cast(dd.serious_adverse_event as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.serious_adverse_event as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' UNION select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'その他の副作用' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【その他の副作用】' as subtitle,cast(dd.other_adverse_event as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.other_adverse_event as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' UNION select 'drug' as type,dd.code_int,cast(dd.code as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,N'関連情報' as cfid,dd.general_name as title,N'【関連情報】' as subtitle,cast(isnull(dd.additional_text,N'') as nvarchar(max)) as body,'drugDetails.aspx?code='+cast(cast(dd.code as integer) as varchar) as url,dd.sequence as sequence,cast(dd.generic_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.preparation_name as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+cast(dd.generic_name_en as nvarchar(max))+N'≡'+isnull(cast(dd.namesynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as namesynonym,isnull(cast(dd.categorysynonym as nvarchar(max)),N'') as categorysynonym,isnull(cast(dd.therapeutic_class as nvarchar(max)),N'') as therapeutic_class,dd.treevalue as treevalue,dd.search_flag, CONVERT(varchar, created_date, 20) as created_date, dd.generic_name, dd.collective_name from T_JP_DrugData as dd where isnull(cast(dd.additional_text as nvarchar(max)),N'')<>N'' ) x left outer join (select code_int, CAST(MAX(CAST(is_generic as INT)) AS BIT) as is_generic from T_JP_DrugDataJpc GROUP BY code_int) ddjpc ON X.code_int = ddjpc.code_int where title not like N'%無効%' AND title not like N'%販売停止%' order by sequence desc

entity.name: fulltextsearchLab
entity.query: select 'LAB_'+cast(x.main_id as nvarchar(max))+'_'+x.cfid+'_'+cast(row_number() over(order by x.type,x.main_id,x.cfid) as nvarchar(max)) as pkid,x.type,'LAB_'+cast(x.main_id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,x.cfid,x.title,x.subtitle,x.body,x.url,0.7 as sequence,x.main_id+x.cfid as group_s,N'' as tb_image,N'' as image_url,N'' as popup_type,x.synonyms as synonym1,N'' as synonym2,N'' as category1,N'' as treevalue,cast(1 as bit) as search_flag from ( select 'labtest' as type,right('000000'+cast(lt.srl_id as nvarchar(max)),7) as main_id,N'臨床意義' as cfid,lt.name as title,N'【臨床意義】' as subtitle,cast(lt.clinical_meaning as nvarchar(max)) as body,'labtestDetails.aspx?code='+right('000000'+cast(lt.srl_id as nvarchar(max)),7) as url, cast(lt.synonyms as nvarchar(max)) as synonyms from T_JP_LabTest as lt UNION select 'labtest' as type,cast(lt5.srl_id as nvarchar(max)) as main_id,isnull(cast(lt5.reduced_disease as nvarchar(max)),N'_') as cfid,cast(lt5.name as nvarchar(max)) as title,N'【'+cast(lt5.reduced_disease as nvarchar(max))+N'】' as subtitle,cast(lt5.disease_name as nvarchar(max)) as body,'labtestDetails.aspx?code='+cast(lt5.srl_id as varchar) as url, NULL as synonyms from T_JP_LabTestTable5 as lt5 where lt5.reduced_disease is not null and lt5.disease_name is not null and cast(lt5.reduced_disease as nvarchar(max))<>N'' and cast(lt5.disease_name as nvarchar(max))<>N'' UNION select 'labtest' as type,right('000000'+cast(lt2.srl_id as nvarchar(max)),7) as main_id,N'基準値' as cfid,cast(lt2.receipt_name as nvarchar(max)) as title,N'【基準値】' as subtitle, cast(lt2.reference_value as nvarchar(max)) as body,'labtestDetails.aspx?code='+right('000000'+cast(lt2.srl_id as nvarchar(max)),7) as url, NULL as synonyms from T_JP_LabTestTable2 as lt2 where lt2.reference_value is not null and lt2.receipt_name is not null and cast(lt2.reference_value as nvarchar(max))<>N'' and cast(lt2.receipt_name as nvarchar(max))<>N'' ) x

entity.name: fulltextsearchMcalc
fulltextsearchHoken
